ComicInfo.Title: Chapter 4: I Believe I Can Fly
ComicInfo.Summary:
CHAPTER 4: I BELIEVE I CAN FLY. Global political hell breaks loose when Russia’s Bond villain of a President cavalierly announces that he is pressing into service the world’s first aberrant military unit. In a desperate attempt to restore order, Article 13’s mole inside NORCO makes a truly audacious move. Featuring the music of R&B superstar R. Kelly.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Davi Leon Dias (a) & Iwan Joko Triyono (c) | 1 | B | Cover B | Davi Leon Dias (a) & Iwan Joko Triyono (c) | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-26 22:16:49. [CVDB684516]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Davi Leon Dias, Iwan Joko Triyono
